title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Southwest Gas: Agentic AI readiness and SAP modernization (HMC205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Southwest Gas：智能体 AI 就绪性和 SAP 现代化 (HMC205)
abstract: How Southwest Gas is laying the foundation for agentic AI using Amazon Bedrock and AWS services. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: Southwest Gas 如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 和 AWS 服务为智能体 AI 奠定基础。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 IBM 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Pankaj Kumar
presenter.title: Executive Partner at IBM Consulting and AWS Practice Leader for Comms and IND
